EmailTemplate.name: Are you going to Citrix Synergy? (1495566935.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you going to Citrix Synergy? (1495566935.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kevin, My colleague and I, AJ Fiore will be down at the Citrix Synergy event for the rest of the week at our booth # 509 and we’d love to have you stop by to put a face to a name. Are you stopping by the event at all this week? Best regards, James James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
